Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.ws

Class EjbcaWSHelperSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.ejb.ws.EjbcaWSHelperSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EjbcaWSHelperSession, EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal, EjbcaWSHelperSessionRemote
    public class EjbcaWSHelperSessionBean
extends Object
implements EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal, EjbcaWSHelperSessionRemote
    Contains methods that are used by both the EjbcaWS, the Ejbca WS tests and by RAMasterApiSessionBean. For instance, methods to convert between EndEntityInformation and UserDataWO.
    Version:
    $Id: EjbcaWSHelperSessionBean.java 29706 2018-08-21 12:50:27Z mikekushner $

    • Method Detail

      • getAdmin

        public AuthenticationToken getAdmin​(boolean allowNonAdmins,
                                    X509Certificate cert)
                             throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Gets an AuthenticationToken object for a WS-API administrator authenticated with the given client certificate. - Checks (through authenticationSession.authenticate) that the certificate is valid - If (WebConfiguration.getRequireAdminCertificateInDatabase) checks (through authenticationSession.authenticate) that the admin certificate is not revoked. - If (allowNonAdmin == false), checks that the admin have access to /administrator, i.e. really is an administrator with the certificate mapped in an admin role. Does not check any other authorization though, other than that it is an administrator.
        Specified by:
        getAdmin in interface EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        allowNonAdmins - false if we should verify that it is a real administrator, true only extracts the certificate and checks that it is not revoked.
        cert - The X.509 client certificate.
        Returns:
        AuthenticationToken object based on the SSL client certificate
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if no client certificate or allowNonAdmins == false and the cert does not belong to an admin

      • convertUserDataVOWSInternal

        public EndEntityInformation convertUserDataVOWSInternal​(UserDataVOWS userdata,
                                                        int caid,
                                                        int endentityprofileid,
                                                        int certificateprofileid,
                                                        int hardtokenissuerid,
                                                        int tokenid,
                                                        boolean useRawSubjectDN)
                                                 throws EjbcaException
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Low-level method to convert between a UserDataVOWS data structure from the web service to an EndEntityInformation. This method does not perform any verification and the method EjbcaWSHelperSession.convertUserDataVOWS(AuthenticationToken, UserDataVOWS)is preferred as it performs sanity checks that profiles and CAs exist.
        Specified by:
        convertUserDataVOWSInternal in interface EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Parameters:
        userdata - UserDataVOWS from the WS
        caid - CA ID
        endentityprofileid - End Entity Profile ID
        certificateprofileid - Certificate Profile ID
        hardtokenissuerid - Hard Token Issuer ID, or 0 to not use.
        tokenid - Token type, TOKEN_TYPE_* constant
        useRawSubjectDN - if true ExtendedInformation in the returned EndEntityInformation will be populated with the Raw subject DN from the UserDataVOWS
        Returns:
        New EndEntityInformation object
        Throws:
        EjbcaException - if there are errors in the UserDataVOWS, such as incorrectly formatted validity dates.

      • convertUserDataVOWS

        public EndEntityInformation convertUserDataVOWS​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                UserDataVOWS userdata)
                                         throws CADoesntExistsException,
                                                EjbcaException
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Method to convert between a UserDataVOWS data structure from the web service to an EndEntityInformation.
        Specified by:
        convertUserDataVOWS in interface EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Authentication token. Used when looking up CA and profile IDs.
        userdata - UserDataVOWS from the WS
        Returns:
        New EndEntityInformation object
        Throws:
        CADoesntExistsException - If the CA referenced by the UserDataVOWS does not exist
        EjbcaException - if any of the referenced profiles does not exist, or there are other errors in the UserDataVOWS object, such as incorrectly formatted validity dates.

      • convertEndEntityInformation

        public UserDataVOWS convertEndEntityInformation​(EndEntityInformation endEntityInformation,
                                                String caname,
                                                String endentityprofilename,
                                                String certificateprofilename,
                                                String hardtokenissuername,
                                                String tokenname)
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Low-level method that converts an EndEntityInformation object to a UserDataVOWS. Used in tests.
        Specified by:
        convertEndEntityInformation in interface EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Parameters:
        endEntityInformation - EndEntityInformation object to convert to a UserDataVOWS
        caname - Name of CA. Will be used as is to the UserDataVOWS object.
        endentityprofilename - Name of end entity profile. Will be used as is to the UserDataVOWS object.
        certificateprofilename - Name of certificate profile. Will be used as is to the UserDataVOWS object.
        hardtokenissuername - Name of hard token issuer. Will be used as is to the UserDataVOWS object.
        tokenname - Token type name. Will be used as is to the UserDataVOWS object.
        Returns:
        New UserDataVOWS object

      • convertEndEntityInformation

        public UserDataVOWS convertEndEntityInformation​(EndEntityInformation endEntityInformation)
                                         throws EjbcaException,
                                                CADoesntExistsException
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Method that converts an EndEntityInformation object to a UserDataVOWS. Used in the findUser and findUserData calls.
        Specified by:
        convertEndEntityInformation in interface EjbcaWSHelperSession
        Parameters:
        endEntityInformation - EndEntityInformation object to convert to a UserDataVOWS
        Returns:
        New UserDataVOWS object
        Throws:
        EjbcaException - if any of the profiles or the hard token issuer referenced by the EndEntityInformation does not exist
        CADoesntExistsException - if the CA referenced by the EndEntityInformation does not exist

      • convertUserMatch

        public Query convertUserMatch​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                              UserMatch usermatch)
                       throws CADoesntExistsException,
                              AuthorizationDeniedException,
                              EndEntityProfileNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Method that converts profile names etc to corresponding ID's
        Specified by:
        convertUserMatch in interface EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        usermatch - a usermatch containing names of profiles
        Returns:
        a query containing id's of profiles.
        Throws:
        CADoesntExistsException - if searching for a non-existent CA.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if searching by a CA which the admin is not authorized to.
        EndEntityProfileNotFoundException - if usermatch was for and end entity profile, and that profile didn't exist

      • returnAuthorizedCertificates

        public List<Certificate> returnAuthorizedCertificates​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                      Collection<Certificate> certs,
                                                      boolean validate,
                                                      long nowMillis)
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Checks authorization for each certificate and optionally check that it's valid. Does not check revocation status.
        Specified by:
        returnAuthorizedCertificates in interface EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - is the admin used for authorization
        certs - is the collection of certs to verify
        validate - set to true to perform validation of each certificate
        nowMillis - current time
        Returns:
        a List of valid and authorized certificates

      • resetUserPasswordAndStatus

        public void resetUserPasswordAndStatus​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                       String username,
                                       int status)
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Resets the password and restores the status for the given end entity. Used for restoring the end entity status if a certificate request operation failed. All exceptions are swallowed and error-logged, since this method is intended to be called from catch blocks.
        Specified by:
        resetUserPasswordAndStatus in interface EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - authentication token.
        username - username of end entity
        status - original end entity status to restore

      • checkValidityAndSetUserPassword

        public void checkValidityAndSetUserPassword​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                            Certificate cert,
                                            String username,
                                            String password)
                                     throws CertificateNotYetValidException,
                                            CertificateExpiredException,
                                            EndEntityProfileValidationException,
                                            AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                            NoSuchEndEntityException,
                                            ApprovalException,
                                            WaitingForApprovalException
        Description copied from interface: EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Verifies that the given certificate has a correct signature and is currently valid, and if so, sets the end entity status to NEW and sets its password. Used from EjbcaWS.cvcRequest during renewals.
        Specified by:
        checkValidityAndSetUserPassword in interface EjbcaWSHelperSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - authentication token
        cert - certificate to check validity and signature of.
        username - username of end entity to update.
        password - new password to set for end entity.
        Throws:
        CertificateNotYetValidException - if the certificate is not yet valid
        CertificateExpiredException - if the certificate has expired
        EndEntityProfileValidationException - if the password does not satisfy the requirements in the end entity profile
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if not authorized to the given end entity
        NoSuchEndEntityException - if there's no end entity with the given username
        ApprovalException - if an approval error occurred while setting end entity status
        WaitingForApprovalException - if approval is required for setting the end entity status
